00045 #ifndef H_BasicEnumerated
00046 # define H_BasicEnumerated
00047 
00048 # include "DomainBase.hh"
00049 
00050 namespace TREX {
00051   namespace transaction {
00052 
00062     class BasicEnumerated :public DomainBase {
00063     public:
00065       virtual ~BasicEnumerated() {}
00066 
00067       bool isInterval() const {
00068        return false;
00069       }
00070       bool isEnumerated() const {
00071        return true;
00072       }
00073 
00074       bool isFull() const {
00075        return 0==getSize();
00076       }
00077       bool isSingleton() const {
00078        return 1==getSize();
00079       }
00080       std::ostream &toXml(std::ostream &out, size_t tabs) const;
00081 
00090       virtual size_t getSize() const =0;
00103       virtual boost::any getElement(size_t i) const =0;
00106       boost::any operator[](size_t i) const {
00107        return getElement(i);
00108       }
00136       template< class Ty, bool Safe >
00137       Ty getTypedElement(size_t n) const {
00138        if( Safe ) 
00139          return TREX::utils::string_cast<Ty>(getStringValue(n));
00140        else 
00141          return boost::any_cast<Ty>(getElement(n));
00142       }
00143            
00157       virtual std::string getStringValue(size_t i) const;
00158 
00159     protected:
00160       explicit BasicEnumerated(TREX::utils::Symbol const &type) 
00161        :DomainBase(type) {}
00162       explicit BasicEnumerated(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node)
00163        :DomainBase(node) {}
00164 
00165       void completeParsing(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node);
00166 
00167       virtual void addTextValue(std::string const &val) =0;
00168       virtual std::ostream &print_value(std::ostream &out, size_t i) const =0;
00169       
00170     private:
00171       void accept(DomainVisitor &visitor) const;
00172       std::ostream &print_domain(std::ostream &out) const;
00173       
00174       boost::any singleton() const {
00175        return getElement(0);
00176       }
00177       std::string stringSingleton() const {
00178        return getStringValue(0);
00179       }
00180     }; // TREX::transaction::BasicEnumerated
